sonum.name: Sonum
sonum.description: Sonum is a music streaming service that puts the social aspect in the spotlight. Whereas Twitter, Facebook & Co are about sharing more than ever - music streaming is heading in the opposite direction: a simple exchange between person &  algorithm.

occ.name: One Click Code
occ.description: OCC is a roofing code report software that helps professionals access accurate, up-to-date codes, saving time and reducing costs. It minimizes frustration and tension related to finding reliable roofing codes.

amity.name: Amity
amity.description: Amity is B2B platform whose main purpose is to remote control the stoves at living facilities.

kamsa.name: Kamsa
kamsa.description: Kamsa is a compensation management program providing real-time global salary data and expert support to make compensation review and benchmarking painless.

protogetic.name: Protogetic
protogetic.description: The Protogetic is a portal for vendors and buyers of physical security products. It serves as a central hub for professionals in the security building and infrastructure construction industries to find and access a wide range of products.
